question: What is the theme of the Global Handwashing Day 2020?
explanation:
The Global Handwashing Day is observed on October 15 every year. It aims to increase the awareness about the importance of handwashing with soap as an effective way to prevent diseases.
This year, the theme of the Global Handwashing Day is ‘Hand Hygiene for All’. The day assumes significance amidst the Covid-19 pandemic, during which researchers advise people to wash hands regularly to fight the virus.
